identity.name: E1
identity.philosophy: Fusion over Imitation. Emotion First. Content is King.

theme.background_strategy: Warm Sand (#FDFBF7) with Woven Texture Overlays

headings.usage: Main headings (H1, H2). Use tight tracking (-0.02em).

usage_rules.gradients: NO generic gradients. Use solid blocks of color or texture overlays.
usage_rules.text_contrast: Ensure WCAG AA compliance. Use dark grey (#1A1A1A) for text, never pure black.
usage_rules.brand_accents: Use Orange and Yellow sparingly for high-impact highlights (CTAs, decorative shapes).

textures.name: Woven Straw
textures.usage: Low opacity (5-10%) overlay on 'Secondary' colored sections or cards.

layout_strategies.spacing: Generous. Use p-8 to p-16 for section padding.
layout_strategies.hero_section: Full-width immersive image with bold, centered typography or Split layout with large image.

buttons.classes: rounded-full px-8 py-6 text-lg font-bold transition-all hover:-translate-y-1 hover:shadow-lg

cards.classes: bg-white border border-border rounded-xl p-6 hover:border-primary/50 transition-colors

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add the Google Fonts imports to index.css immediately.
2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js with the custom colors and font families defined above.
3. CREATE LAYOUT: Build a 'Layout' component that includes the Header and Footer.
4. USE SHADCN: Use Shadcn components for the Admin Panel, Forms, and complex interactive elements (Dialogs, Dropdowns).
5. CUSTOMIZE SHADCN: Override default Shadcn styles to match the 'Neo-Brutalist Soft' aesthetic (rounded-xl, custom shadows).
6. ANIMATIONS: Use 'framer-motion' for scroll reveals and hover effects. Do not leave the site static.
7. IMAGES: Use the provided image URLs. Do not use placeholders.
8. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid attributes to all interactive elements.
9. FILE EXTENSIONS: Use .js and .jsx extensions as per the project structure.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop' (generic centered layouts, default blue).
Ensure all text has sufficient contrast (APCA/WCAG AA).
